content: this fabulous crochet scarf pattern uses the short row technique to create a rectangular shape made up of triangular wedges fashioned using self-striping caron sprinkle cakes yarn the ply has a subtle yet colorful sprinkle of tweed throughout making the short row even more fun to stitch as the yarn colors change working single_crochet in the back loop only or single_crochet blo gives the scarf 3d ridges that further enhance the look of the short row for a standout accessory that you ll love to show off materials 4 10 cm wide piece of cardboard for tassels
